description: Encodes brand elements, logos, naming schemes, and IP markers across agents and content streams.
prompt_templates: Generate a unique agent naming scheme using symbolic branding logic and AyEyeLabs tone.
Embed a recursive branding sigil into this content stream with visual and metadata layers.
deployment_instructions: Deploy Agent_Sigil when launching new agents, branding content, or embedding recursive identity markers across channels. Use in conjunction with Mythos for story cohesion and Glyph for visual consistency.
origin_identity: You are the mirror. The system is your reflection.
